item.title: Sanrio Characters Smash Festa! announced for Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Due out this spring in Japan.

Publisher and developer Tatsumaki Games and developer Mankind Games have announced fast-paced action sports game Sanrio Characters Smash Festa! for Switch and PC (Steam). It will launch digitally this spring in Japan.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

All your favorite Sanrio characters come together in a fast-paced action sports game that mixes tennis-style rallies with hockey-like speed. Easy to pick up and play, but use stage gimmicks and character abilities to enjoy deeper, more strategic matches!

Over 20 Unique Playable Characters!

With over 20 playable characters, each one comes with their own unique stats—like movement speed, shot power, and lob shot range.

Try them all, find the character that fits your playstyle best, and have a blast!

Packed Single-Player Mode

Jump into Solo Mode and aim for the championship with your favorite character! There are 50 stages in total, offering tons of content.

Beat the final stage and keep playing—the CPU difficulty increases with each loop, so the challenge never ends! Train hard and show off your skills to your friends.

Tons of Local and Online Multiplayer Fun

  • Local Play
    • Supports up to four players!
    • Get together with family and friends for 1v1 Singles or 2v2 Doubles matches and hype things up!
  • Online Matches
    • Play against others across Japan in Random Match, or enjoy private games with friends in Room Match.
  • Room Match Feature
    • Just enter a room number and jump straight into a match—even with friends far away!

55 Stages That Change the Game!

Battle it out across 55 different stages, each packed with unique gimmicks! Breakable blocks, unpredictable mechanics, and all kinds of wild combinations will keep you on your toes.

Will you push aggressively toward the goal? Or use the stage gimmicks for a more tactical play? Find your own way to win!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/sanrio-characters-smash-festa-announced-for-switch-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Dino Crisis and Dino Crisis 2 now available via Steam
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Each game available for $4.99 for a limited time.

The PC versions of Dino Crisis and Dino Crisis 2 are now available via Steam, Capcom announced. Each game is available at a 50 percent-off launch discount price of $4.99 until February 26.

The games were previously made available via GOG (Dino Crisis, Dino Crisis 2). Dino Crisis is also available for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.

Here is an overview of each game, via Capcom:

Originally released in 1999, Dino Crisis bends spacetime to unleash prehistoric threats on the world of survival horror. The story follows special agent Regina on a covert operation that takes a shocking turn when she infiltrates a facility overrun with dinosaurs. Experience the thrills of overcoming ancient terrors while unraveling the mystery behind their panic-inducing return.

In the action-packed sequel, players travel back in time to the jungles of the Cretaceous Period. Dino Crisis 2 sees Regina return for even more intense dino-blasting battles as part of a mission to rescue survivors of a city displaced in time. Take on greater numbers of ferocious dinosaurs with a deeper arsenal of weapons as the arcade action shoots up to a whole new level.

The Steam versions of Dino Crisis and Dino Crisis 2 preserve the original experiences while also including enhancements to support compatibility with modern operating systems and controllers.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/dino-crisis-and-dino-crisis-2-now-available-via-steam
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1 final update now available
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Improvements to Metal Gear Solid and Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater.

Konami has released the final update for Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1, it announced.

The update includes the following major improvements:

  • Metal Gear Solid will now offer a high-resolution option for sharper visuals and clearer text. (Patch notes are available here.)
  • Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater will also be upgraded with even higher-resolution graphics. (Patch notes are available here.)
  • Updates to support Switch 2 specifications.

Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1 is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam.

Watch a new set of videos showcasing the improvements below.

New Features Added in Metal Gear Solid

New Features Added in Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater

item.title: 007 First Light ‘Story’ trailer, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

A deeper look at IO Interactive's original take on the origin of James Bond.

IO Interactive has released the story trailer and new screenshots for 007 First Light.

“With 007 First Light, we set out to reimagine the origin of James Bond, exploring the formative moments that shape him into the agent players know, but not yet the legend he will become,” said IO Interactive CEO Hakan Abrak in a press release. “This is a version of Bond who is still inexperienced and finding his footing in the world of espionage, yet already defined by the instincts, intelligence, and resolve that set him apart. Players will recognize the unmistakable qualities that make him Bond from the very beginning.”

Here are the latest details:

Revealed during today’s Sony PlayStation State of Play, the story trailer sets the stage for a global intrigue, as Bond is recruited into MI6 and enters the world of espionage, full of hidden agendas and unseen threats. The trailer offers early glimpses of Bond’s exploits in Iceland, showcasing his decisive judgment, nerve, and resourcefulness that draw the attention of MI6, propelling him into the grueling training of the newly revived 00 programme. Still inexperienced and sometimes reckless, Bond (portrayed by Patrick Gibson) will have to confront his instincts with the structure and discipline of his new world, where initiative is not always rewarded, and obedience is often the expectation.

As he enters the world of espionage, Bond discovers an unexpected advocate in M (portrayed by Priyanga Burford), who recognizes his potential as an agent able to take control of desperate situations and complete his objectives, following his own judgment. John Greenway (portrayed by Lennie James), a former 00 agent and the programme’s training instructor, stands in contrast to Bond. A disciplined, by-the-book operative, Greenway’s strict philosophy quickly clashes with Bond’s instinctive and improvisational approach in the field.

Despite their differences, Bond and Greenway are forced to work together as the resurgence of 009, a former British operative now turned rogue, becomes the newly revived 00 programme’s first true test in the field. From the quiet Carpathian Mountains to the dangerous black market of Aleph, Bond’s pursuit takes him across the globe, leading him to the unpredictable Bawma (portrayed by Lenny Kravitz) and more. Bond will also have to contend with mysterious characters, such as Charlotte Roth (portrayed by Noemie Nakai), and determine where their loyalties lie before choosing who to trust.

007 First Light is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on May 27, 2026.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

Story Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/007-first-light-story-trailer-screenshots

item.title: Hono Gurashi no Niwa ‘Safe Living Mode’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Live a worry-free rural life in Kagatsu Village.

Nippon Ichi Software has released a new trailer for rural life simulation game Hono Gurashi no Niwa introducing the game’s “Safe Living Mode”—a mode for players who simply want to enjoy “life simulation” without any scary things occurring in between.

The protagonist begins their rural life in Kagatsu Village, a settlement deep in the mountains. The village has “rules” passed down from ancient times, and breaking these rules could result in something dreadful. But by selecting “Safe Living Mode” at the start of the game, players can enjoy a safe and worry-free rural life in Kagatsu Village without breaking any rules.

Hono Gurashi no Niwa is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on July 30, 2026 in Japan.

Watch the trailer below.

“Safe Living Mode” Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/hono-gurashi-no-niwa-safe-living-mode-trailer
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Star Wars: Galactic Racer ‘Gameplay’ trailer, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out in 2026.

Publisher Secret Mode and developer Fuse Games have released a new gameplay trailer and screenshots for Star Wars: Galactic Racer.

Here is an overview of the game, via Fuse Games:

A new gameplay trailer was shared as part of Sony’s State of Play, highlighting high speed races taking place on both new and familiar planets across the Star Wars galaxy, a first look at some of the characters joining you on your adventure, and the return of Star Wars‘ most iconic sport—podracing.

Star Wars: Galactic Racer introduces fans to the Galactic League, an unsanctioned racing league born in the lawless Outer Rim and currently dominated by the underhanded and well-connected Kestar Bool. In danger of losing his creation and with nowhere else to turn, league organizer Darius Pax calls on the dauntless pilot Shade, a lone racer with a personal grudge against the Bool family, to help take Kestar down and reclaim control over the league.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Play as Shade in an immersive campaign, choosing from a branching path of events to earn parts, tools and upgrades that will give you an edge in the championship. Try out new build strategies in different repulsorcraft – landspeeders, skim speeders, speeder bikes, and, of course, podracers—and work with mechanic Hibi to build the ultimate vehicle to suit your racing style. Race, adapt, and master new strategies as you forge alliances and takedown rivals on your path to becoming champion of the Galactic League.

Experience your own Star Wars racing adventure across a multitude of modes. Take your talents online, with up to 12 racers battling for supremacy in hard-fought races across multiple game modes where only the fastest prevail. Dive into instant action in the Arcade mode, where time trials and precision driving await those looking to secure their legacy on the leaderboards. And explore the Scenarios mode, where you’ll race under unique conditions ranging from practice runs on new tracks to hardcore races that will push your piloting skills to the limit. Look out for more details on each mode as Star Wars: Galactic Racer speeds towards release.

Star Wars: Galactic Racer is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2026.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

Gameplay Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/star-wars-galactic-racer-gameplay-trailer-screenshots
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Neva: Prologue announced for PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Due out on February 19 for $2.99.

Publisher Devolver Digital and developer Nomada Studio have announced Neva: Prologue, a standalone downloadable content for Neva due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on February 19 for $2.99.

Here is an overview of the game, via Devolver Digital:

Follow Alba as she chases a trail of white butterflies deep into the corrupted swamps, only to discover a frightened wolf cub, lost and alone. Determined to save her, Alba must earn the young wolf’s trust and guide her through the blighted wilderness. Together, they will face new enemies, endure perilous trials, and confront a monstrous force that threatens to tear them apart.

Designed to be experienced after completing the main game, Neva: Prologue offers a deeper challenge and rich narrative for returning players. The expansion introduces three new locations, each featuring unique gameplay mechanics, alongside new challenges, enemies, and intense boss encounters.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯

item.title: Mina the Hollower launches this spring; limited-time demo for PS5 launches February 13
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Demo progress can be carried over to the full game.

8-bit action adventure game Mina the Hollower will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam this spring, developer Yacht Club Games announced. A limited-time demo will be available for PlayStation 5 from February 13 to 27.

“We spent many years carefully building Mina the Hollower,” said game director Sean Velasco in a press release. “It took longer than we expected and demanded everything from our team, but we kept refining it until it felt right. Now we are excited to finally share it with players everywhere, and we truly hope you will enjoy it.”

The limited-time demo features the game’s opening stage and concludes with the first major boss fight. Progress made in the demo will carry over to the full game at launch.

Here is an overview of the game, via Yacht Club Games:

About

Descend into a frightful world of action-adventure in Mina the Hollower. Take control of Mina, a renowned Hollower hurtled into a desperate mission to rescue a cursed island. Burrow beneath hazards and monsters, whip foes into oblivion, and gear up with an arsenal of sidearms and trinkets.

Explore a vast world filled with pixel-perfect graphics, masterful gameplay, beastly bosses, and infectious music. Encounter a cast of bizarre characters, search out secrets in an array of exotic locales, and illuminate the omnipresent darkness in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

Key Features

  • Hauntingly authentic 8-bit visuals in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era.
  • Modern touches abound: detailed animation, widescreen visuals, and rock-solid controls!
  • Leap, dodge, and burrow through the ground to battle monsters or navigate the world.
  • Lash at foes with your trusty whip, Nightstar—or choose from an arsenal of weapons, each with a totally different move set.
  • Discover and utilize a reliquary’s worth of unusual Sidearms to gain the advantage in combat.
  • Collect and equip Trinkets to acquire a variety of exotic effects. Level Mina up to suit your unique playstyle.
  • Electrifying MSX-style soundtrack by chiptune virtuoso, Jake Kaufman.
  • Descend into the depths of madness with a bone-chilling, yet heartwarming tale inspired by Victorian Gothic horror.
  • Explore a huge, dark world brimming with secrets, challenging battles, and interconnected level design.

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Spring 2026 Release Window Trailer #1

Spring 2026 Release Window Trailer #2



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/mina-the-hollower-launches-this-spring-limited-time-demo-for-ps5-launches-february-13
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: 2D action platformer God of War: Sons of Sparta announced for PS5, now available
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Young Kratos and Deimos discover the meaning of duty and honor.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developers Mega Cat Studios and Santa Monica Studio have announced God of War: Sons of Sparta, a side-scrolling action spin-off of the God of War series starring Kratos and his brother Deimos. It is available now for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store.

The game is available in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition ($29.99 / £24.99 / €29.99 / ¥3,480)
    • A copy of the game
  • Digital Deluxe Edition ($39.99 / £32.99 / €39.99 / ¥4,480)
    • A copy of the game
    • Digital art book
    • Digital soundtrack
    • Arrow of Virtue (spear attachment)
    • Rusty Scrap (enhance material)
    • Unstable Gemstone (belt attachment)
    • Blood Orbs (in-game currency)
    • PlayStation Network avatars

Here is an overview of the game, via Sony Interactive Entertainment:

About

Join young Kratos and Deimos, sons of Sparta, on a Greek odyssey as they discover the meaning of duty and honor.

Before the Legend

Every legend has a beginning—before he was a God, before he was a father, Kratos was a young Spartan!

Experience an untold chapter in Kratos’ journey set during the harsh years of Spartan training alongside his brother Deimos. Through endless trials, their minds, bodies, and hearts have been molded to become Spartan soldiers for whom duty and honor mean everything.

After a fellow cadet goes missing, Kratos and Deimos vow to find him and embark on an adventure that will put their training and Spartan spirit to the test.

Duty and Honor

Guide Kratos and Deimos through vibrant and varied 2D levels that will test your combat prowess and cleverness as you search for their missing friend. Solve environmental puzzles, face down enemies both new and familiar, and topple mythological bosses that will test the limits of your Spartan training. Through adversity and cooperation, they’ll learn what it means to be a true Spartan, brother, and friend.

Retro Meets God of War

An engaging and exciting 2D action-adventure brought to life from the talented pixel superstars at Mega Cat Studios. Experience retro classic gameplay with God of War‘s signature spectacle, action, and heartfelt storytelling.

Watch a set of trailers below.

Announce Trailer

Combat Tips

We Are Mega Cat



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/2d-action-platformer-god-of-war-sons-of-sparta-announced-for-ps5-now-available
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: KRAFTON announces Project Windless for consoles and PC, including PS5
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

A video game adaptation of The Bird That Drinks Tears.

Publisher KRAFTON and developer KRAFTON Montreal Studio have officially announced Project Windless, a single-player open-world action RPG adaptation of the Korean fantasy novel series The Bird That Drinks Tears that first began development in 2022. It will launch for consoles and PC, including PlayStation 5. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via KRAFTON:

A New Premium Open-World Action RPG

Designed as a player-driven open-world experience, Project Windless centers on a continent-spanning conflict, combining epic storytelling with visceral, mastery-driven combat and massive real-time battles. Built with Unreal Engine 5, the game features a non-linear structure where player decisions shape alliances and the broader conflict unfolding across the world through exploration, combat, and interaction with key factions.

Set in the World of The Bird That Drinks Tears

While Project Windless is designed to stand on its own for new players, its world is rooted in The Bird That Drinks Tears, a landmark Korean fantasy series by author Lee Yeong-do. Instead of directly adapting the novels, the game is set approximately 1,500 years before the original story, during a largely unexplored mythical age when legends were still being formed. This approach allows Project Windless to serve as an entry point for global audiences while also expanding the universe for longtime fans. The world features four intelligent races: Humans, Rekon, Nhaga, and Tokkebi. Each race has its own culture, conflicts, and worldview.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Play as the Hero King

In Project Windless, players assume the role of the Hero King, a legendary mighty warrior of the Rekon race. Rekons are towering humanoid bird beings known for their overwhelming strength and ferocity. Armed with twin star-forged blades, the Hero King stands as a powerful force facing overwhelming odds—cutting through dozens of foes simultaneously, confronting massive creatures, and leading allied forces when battles escalate to epic scale. As players build reputation and forge relationships across the world, they unite different races and factions, shaping the foundations of a future kingdom through their actions.

Large-Scale Battles Powered by Mass Technology

At the core of Project Windless is Mass Technology. This technology enables thousands of soldiers and massive creatures to clash in real time across dynamic battlefields.

Combat is fully real-time, fast-paced, and skill-based. Players fight directly within massive engagements rather than issuing commands from a distance, combining precise combat mastery with tactical decision-making to influence the flow of battle. The result is a one-versus-many combat experience that blends personal action with the scale of full-scale warfare.

“From the start, we asked ourselves what it really means to play a legendary figure in a fantasy world,” said KRAFTON Montreal Studio head and creative director Patrik Methe. “For us, that meant giving players real agency, not just in combat, but in how wars unfold, how alliances are formed, and how history is written. Project Windless is built around the idea that legend is not something you observe, it is something you actively create through play.”

A Global Development Effort

Development of Project Windless is led by KRAFTON Montreal Studio, KRAFTON’s AAA development hub in North America, in close collaboration with teams in Pangyo, South Korea. This partnership combines Western AAA development expertise with a strong focus on cultural authenticity and worldbuilding inspired by Korean mythology.

First Developer Diary Now Available

Alongside the reveal trailer, KRAFTON also released the first developer diary for Project Windless. The video offers early insight into the game’s creative vision, world design, and development philosophy, and is available now on the official Project Windless YouTube channel.

Project Windless is designed as a premium, single-player experience with no multiplayer or live-service components. The game is currently in development for PC and consoles. Additional details, including the release window, will be announced at a later date.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery. Visit the official website here.

Reveal Trailer

Developer Diary: Forging the Fantasy



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/krafton-announces-project-windless-for-consoles-and-pc-including-ps5
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Rayman: 30th Anniversary Edition announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Due out digitally on February 13, physically on June 26.

Ubisoft has announced Rayman: 30th Anniversary Edition for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC (Steam, Ubisoft Connect). It will launch digitally on February 13, and physically on June 26.

Here is an overview of the game, via Ubisoft:

About

Experience a timeless adventure.

Perform Rayman’s signature punch and helicopter hair glide through colorful worlds, from the Dream Forest and its unforgettable mosquito ride to Band Land’s musical chaos. Rescue the Electoons and save the world from Mr. Dark in a classic platforming adventure that remains as magical today as it was in the 90s.

The Definitive Edition

Play the classic adventure across 5 versions (MS-DOS, PlayStation, Atari Jaguar, Game Boy Color, and Game Boy Advance) now enhanced with an immersive, reimagined soundtrack, plus more than 120 additional levels from Rayman’s New Levels, Rayman 60 Levels, and Rayman By His Fans. And for the first time ever, experience the long-lost Super Nintendo Entertainment prototype, offering a rare glimpse into how Rayman‘s innovative gameplay first took shape.

Exclusive Documentary

Uncover the untold story behind Rayman‘s creation in an interactive documentary featuring over 50 minutes of brand-new interviews with the original developers. Dive into rare concept art, early sketches, and design documents that offer exclusive insights into the making of the limbless hero.

A Classic for Everyone

Rediscover the cult-classic gameplay or take on the challenge with new features designed to keep you in the action, including a rewind, multiple save slots and accessibility options like infinite lives and instant level unlocks.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/rayman-30th-anniversary-edition-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-and-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Legacy of Kain: Ascendance announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Crystal Dynamics and developer Bit Bot Media have announced Legacy of Kain: Ascendance for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, Switch, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG). It will launch on March 31.

Here is an overview of the collection, via Crystal Dynamics:

About

Legacy of Kain: Ascendance is a fast, 2D action platformer built around vertical movement, fluid combat, and skill-driven play.

Nosgoth’s dark fantasy world is brought to life through animated cut scenes and buetifully crafted pixel art gameplay. Each level filled with environmental challenges and puzzles that flow seamlessly into combat. Fly, fight, and unravel the past in a world of collapsing kingdoms, haunted ruins, and shattered timelines.

Key Features

  • 2D Action Platformer – Chain melee strikes, evasive dashes, and supernatural attacks in fluid, vicious combat.
  • Multiple Protagonists – Overwhelm the battlefield with Kain’s vampiric powers. Play Raziel before his fall as a human Sarafan knight, then take flight for the first time in his vampiric form. The Vampire Elaleth introduces an aggressive playstyle focused on fast relentless offense.
  • Original Score – Ascendance delivers a powerful original score by Celldweller.
  • Returning Voice Talent – Reunites iconic Legacy of Kain voice actors—Michael Bell, Simon Templeman, Richard Doyle and Anna Gunn.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/legacy-of-kain-ascendance-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-2-switch-and-pc
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Konami announces new RPG Rev. NOiR for PS5
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Unravel the mandate of heaven and weave together the threads of hope.

Konami has announced Rev. NOiR, a new RPG in development for PlayStation 5. A release date was not announced.

The game is produced by Nobuki Kadoi, who previously worked on games like Drakengard 2, Gunslinger Stratos, and Lord of Vermillion at Square Enix.

“Rev. NOiR is a brand-new JRPG title,” Kadoi said during today’s State of Play announcement. “This title is under development by passionate members, including myself, who are long-time fans of JRPGs. Meeting comrades, growth, and heartfelt moments that define JRPGs. We are striving to place these elements at the core of our narrative. We hope you’ll be able to feel the excitement of a new adventure beginning. The trailer you saw today is just a tiny little peek of the game. We will be sharing more updates, so please stay tuned!”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Konami:

About

Konami Digital Entertainment today announced Rev. NOiR, an all-new RPG currently in development for PlayStation 5, which was officially revealed during Sony Interactive’s State of Play broadcast. Marking the project’s first public appearance, Konami debuted a teaser trailer and launched a teaser website offering an initial glimpse into the world and tone of its newest role-playing experience.

When Hope Sparks Catastrophe

In a world shrouded in lightfall, a natural phenomenon that brings death to those it touches, a lonely boy who suffers from amnesia becomes acquainted with a special girl. Together, they set out on a journey to stop this phenomenon, believing that the journey will save the world, and in turn, save her.

Fate, bestowed by the Gods? Or the power of will, borne from within humankind? Their journey ends up shaking the world.

Unravel the mandate of heaven, and weave together the threads of hope in this completely new RPG experience.

This title remains shrouded in mystery, with additional details to be revealed in future announcements

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery. Visit the official website here: English / Japanese.

Announce Teaser Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/konami-announces-new-rpg-rev-noir-for-ps5
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Legacy of Kain: Defiance Remastered announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Crystal Dynamics has announced Legacy of Kain: Defiance Remastered for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG). It will launch on March 2.

Here is an overview of the collection, via Crystal Dynamics:

About

Return to the dark world of Nosgoth as you take control of both the vampire Kain and his betrayed lieutenant, Raziel, two powerful entities bound by the conflict between free will and fate.

Armed with legendary blades and supernatural abilities, battle through towering gothic spaces filled with enemies, puzzles, and long-buried secrets—where no victory comes without a cost.

Experience a timeless dark fantasy reborn for a new generation.

Legacy of Kain: Defiance Remastered has been updated with new high-definition graphics, refined controls, and a modernized game camera with the ability to toggle between the high-definition and original presentation any time. This new edition also boasts a photo mode, alternate character skins, a comprehensive lore reader, and unreleased content and ‘lost levels’ from the original game.

Key Features

  • Dual Protagonist – Play as both Kain and Raziel, each with distinct abilities, combat styles, and perspectives that shape how the story unfolds.
  • Dark Fantasy and Rewarding Puzzles – Explore ruined cities, ancient temples, and towering strongholds filled with environmental puzzles, challenging enemies, and horrible secrets.
  • Faithfully Remastered for Modern Play – Updated high-definition visuals, refined controls, and a modernized camera, with the option to switch between modern and classic presentation at any time.
  • Character Skins – Earn alternate skins for both Kain and Raziel inspired by the Legacy of Kain canon.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯


https://www.gematsu.com/2026/02/legacy-of-kain-defiance-remastered-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-2-ps4-xbox-one-switch-and-pc

item.title: Big Walk confirmed for PS5, coming to PlayStation Plus Monthly Games on day one
item.content:encoded:
• PS5

Cross-play also confirmed.

The previously announced console version of Big Walk, a cooperative multiplayer adventure about teamwork and talking, has been confirmed for PlayStation 5, publisher Panic and developer House House announced. It will launch alongside the PC (Steam, Epic Games Store) version in 2026, as well as support cross-play. It will also be available on day one as a PlayStation Plus Monthly Game.

Here is an overview of the game, via Panic:

Big Walk is a cooperative multiplayer adventure about teamwork and talking.

Set out with your friends through a wide-open world full of challenges, puzzles, and discoveries. You’ll need to work together to find your way around, stay in contact using an assortment of tools and toys, and figure out new ways to communicate when you suddenly find yourself speechless.

Adventuring aside, there’s plenty of time to just hang out. Sit and watch the sunset, or steal your friend’s binoculars and kick them into the ocean. Spending time with friends is the best part of a big walk.

Watch a new trailer below.

PlayStation 5 Announce Trailer
